name: Everybody's Stress Buster
overview: Everybody's Stress Buster is a Compilation/Mini Games video game published by Sony released on December 15, 2010 for the PSP. This game includes all the mini games on this 4 other games: Hot Shots Shorties Blue Hot Shots Shorties Green Hot Shots Shorties Yellow Hot Shots Shorties Red Enjoy 12 fun-packed mini-games that anyone can play, including Vacuum Dash and Soccer Derby. Choose from four separate volumes: Green, Blue, Red and Yellow, each with their own set of three mini-games games, or be the first of your friends to blast through all 12 mini-games in the Rainbow pack. Hop into a turbo-charged racing car in Rush Hour Master, cut some mutant vegetables down to size in Counter Crusader or go baseball crazy in Home Run Derby.
